name: truth-verification
description: Ensure research integrity by tracking data provenance, verifying authenticity, and preventing fabricated claims

commands.name: init
commands.description: Initialize .truth/ infrastructure for data tracking and verification

commands.name: register
commands.description: Register data sources with SHA256 hashing for integrity verification

commands.name: track
commands.description: Track analysis script execution and data dependencies

commands.name: verify
commands.description: Verify data integrity by comparing current file hashes against registered values

commands.name: cite-check
commands.description: Validate citations in papers and ensure all referenced data is registered

commands.name: reproduce
commands.description: Validate reproducibility by checking dependency chains and computing reproducibility scores

commands.name: audit
commands.description: Generate comprehensive audit reports with timeline and anomaly detection

commands.name: status
commands.description: Display verification status dashboard with statistics and recommendations
